concept.title: 5225.370 Contracts requiring performance or delivery in a foreign country.

conbody.p: (d) Contracting Officers shall address Theater Business Clearance (TBC) requirements when soliciting or awarding contracts or performing contract administration. Solicitations and contracts subject to TBC are those valued in excess of $150K and with performance greater than 30 days that require performance or delivery, including construction contracts, with the place of performance in Afghanistan.
